commit.message:
protoize.c (main): Correctly set locale categories.

2000-12-14  Philipp Thomas  <pthomas@suse.de>
	* protoize.c (main): Correctly set locale categories.
	* gcc.c (main): Likewise.
	* cppmain.c (general_init): Likewise.
	* toplev.c (main): Likewise.
	* gcov.c (main): Likewise.
	* collect2.c (main): Likewise.

From-SVN: r38331
